akas from release info: Медиумът от Лонг Айлънд Bulgaria (Bulgarian title)

6.title: Sitcom Spirits
6.plot: In tonight's new episode, Theresa gets to read for some of her all time favorite sitcom stars. Appearing here, is the iconic film and television actress, Barbara Eden from "I Dream of Jeannie" who is still grieving the loss of her beloved son Matthew. Theresa performs psychic readings for the five celebrities including Mindy Cohn,(The Facts of Life) John Ratzenberger, (Cheers) Annie Potts, (Designing Women) and Tisha Campbell-Martin (My Wife and Kids).

1.title: No Turning Off
1.plot: Theresa is a typical Long Island mom who has a very special gift. She talks to the dead. While Theresa helps other families find closure and peace, her own family occasionally get annoyed by her inability to turn this gift "off".

2.title: Driving Me Nuts
2.plot: Theresa is enlisted to teach her 16 year old daughter Victoria how to drive. Theresa's nerves and Victoria's lack of skills behind the wheel combine to make the lesson an unpleasant experience. Later Theresa reads a distraught mother.

3.title: Spirit Release
3.plot: The spirit of a 6-year-old boy comes to Theresa and won't leave. This spirit is taking a serious emotional toll on Theresa, interfering with her work and her life. To make matters worse she doesn't know how or if she will be able to release this energy.

4.title: This Isn't Working
4.plot: Theresa meets with many of her clients in the comfort of her home, requiring her family to stay away. Larry, her newly retired husband is having a hard time with this. Also, Theresa reads two men trying to connect with a friend who passed away suddenly.

5.title: Theresa's Upgrade
5.plot: After incessantly teasing her about the cassette recorder she uses to tape her sessions, Theresa's kids decide to get her something more advanced. Now she just needs to figure out how to use it. Also, a woman seeks closure following her sister's death.

6.title: Reconnecting
6.plot: Theresa plans a "girls" trip to a local winery to reconnect with her friends. However, the relaxing trip becomes stressful for Theresa when a skeptic comes along. And, Theresa reads a couple who lost a close friend.

7.title: Blessing & a Curse
7.plot: Theresa loves to use her ability to help people, and as a result she finds herself putting spirit first, and her family second. Later, Theresa reads a woman who wants to hear from her deceased father.

8.title: Theresa Explains It All
8.plot: Theresa is so touched reading a woman whose son passed away in jail, she decides to do a group reading in a Long Island prison. While there, Theresa connects a woman with her family, in one of the most touching and surprising readings to date.

9.title: Sailing with Spirits
9.plot: Theresa is invited to do a group reading on a cruise ship travelling to the Bahamas. With no escape from the spirits on the ship, how many people will Theresa read? And, Theresa's husband shocks her with the surprise of a lifetime.

1.title: Meeting the Parents
1.plot: Theresa's special gift of being a medium has no filter and certainly no "off" switch.So when Theresa invites Victoria's boyfriend and his parents over for dinner, Victoria becomes instantly anxious that her mom will humiliate her by reading someone.

2.title: Drumming and Healing
2.plot: Theresa visits with people who are so consumed with anger over the death of loved ones that they're finding it difficult to move on with their lives. First, Theresa visits with a guilt-ridden man who wished his brother dead right before he overdosed.

3.title: Losing It
3.plot: When Theresa decides to get in shape and enlist the help of her son at the gym, spirit interferes with their workout. Also, a woman hears from her husband who passed and Theresa has an emotional breakdown during the reading.

4.title: Poor Petey
4.plot: The Caputo family has some tough decisions to make, as the health of their beloved dog, Petey, starts to decline. While at the vet with Petey. And Theresa reconnects a woman with her deceased husband.

5.title: Christmas Spirit
5.plot: It's Christmas on Long Island and in true holiday fashion, Theresa spreads the gift of giving when she brings her family to volunteer at a local soup kitchen. When spirit interrupts Theresa's philanthropy, a skeptic is left in absolute shock.

6.title: Spirit Al Dente
6.plot: Tired of hearing her family complain about her lack of culinary chops, Theresa aims to prove to her kids that she can do more than just order takeout. But while attending a cooking class, spirit gets in the way of Theresa becoming an expert chef.

7.title: Car Crazy
7.plot: Victoria tries to use her charm to finagle a car from her parents. Theresa is vehemently against the idea, but her husband Larry is on the fence. Also, Theresa helps a young woman reconnect with her father that died tragically.

8.title: Just Like Me
8.plot: Theresa's friend divulges that her son has the ability to see spirit, empathizing with the young boy's unique situation and wants to help. But meeting up with her potential protégé results in an unexpected revelation when the tables are turned on Theresa.

9.title: Wheelin' & Dealin'
9.plot: Theresa's parenting skills are put to the test when she urges Victoria to earn her keep around the house. But will Victoria's efforts backfire on her mother? Also, Theresa helps a woman who struggles with letting her grandmother go.

10.title: Long Island Romance
10.plot: With Valentine's Day fast approaching, planning a last minute romantic night becomes a more difficult task than Larry had expected. Plus, Theresa meets with one of her biggest skeptics yet.

11.title: Bellies & Babies
11.plot: After Larry Jr. critiques the odd idea of his mother doing a reading at a Baby Shower, Theresa instantly feels nervous about possibly cramping the celebration. Will the expecting mother be happy to have a medium at her party?

12.title: Apply Yourself
12.plot: Theresa and Larry stress the importance of college to their daughter. However, their stern methods and the pressure of senior year become a little too much for Victoria. Plus, the tables are flipped when Theresa becomes the skeptic at her friend's house.

13.title: Uneasy
13.plot: While appearing at a local radio station, Theresa is blindsided when her mediumship is suddenly put to the test. Also, when Theresa accompanies her husband to a tattoo shop, she quickly realizes that she is there for more than just "ink" support.

14.title: Spirit and the City
14.plot: Booked for a group reading in NYC, Theresa and the family decide to take a day trip to the Big Apple. Will the hustle and bustle of the city get in Theresa's way of channeling or will spirit fall on Manhattan?

1.title: Homecoming
1.plot: When her graduating son returns home from college, Theresa tries to convince him to stay in the house forever. Also, a woman is able heal from the tragic loss of her daughter after a shocking discovery from spirit.

2.title: A Medium Surprise
2.plot: With her birthday fast approaching, Larry and the kids decide to throw a surprise party for Theresa. But surprising a medium isn't the easiest thing to do. And a woman's deceased husband delivers a message to his wife that she's been longing for.

3.title: Help Me
3.plot: With Theresa's schedule filling up, she decides to venture out of her comfort zone and hire a helping hand. Also, a young man takes desperate measures in trying to cope with the loss of his brother.

4.title: The Princess and Her Prom
4.plot: When Theresa's daughter Victoria pays the family a short visit from college and shocks them with some major changes, they wonder about her newfound independence . Plus, Theresa connects a young boy with his sister who passed away.

5.title: The Flying Larrys
5.plot: Now that Theresa's son is finished with his academic duties, he decides to explore his wild side and go skydiving. Also, Theresa encounters one of her biggest skeptics while cleansing a restaurant of its negative energy.

6.title: My Keys Now
6.plot: Victoria gets into her first car accident. Theresa sympathizes with her daughter until she has a second fender bender in the same week. Also, Theresa enables a young lady to heal from the sudden loss of her mother at a group reading.

7.title: Beach Bonding
7.plot: Theresa 's off to the beach for some one-on-one relaxation time with her husband Larry. But since Theresa is never really alone, their beach bonding day isn't all that calming. Also, Theresa shocks a woman with specific details of her deceased husband.

8.title: The Graduate
8.plot: Victoria is finally graduating from high school and the Caputo family could not be any prouder. Plus, Theresa helps a man embrace his future after the tragedy in his life is revealed during a reading.

9.title: The Family Photo
9.plot: When Theresa suggests taking a family picture, she is met with resistance from the Caputo clan. Also, Theresa helps a grieving woman cope with her brother's tragic death.

10.title: Joe Skeptic
10.plot: Theresa and Larry go on a double date with their skeptical friend Joe, will her abilities finally turn him into a believer? Also, a couple seeks help from Theresa with the mysterious death of their son.

11.title: FAQ
11.plot: In this very special episode, Theresa gives an exclusive look into her life as a mother and a medium. With her family by her side, Theresa answers questions from curious fans that want to know more about her gift and how spirit affects her daily life.

12.title: Never Before Seen
12.plot: In this special episode, Theresa opens up the vault of never before seen footage detailing validations that have empowered people to connect with their lost ones.

14.title: Like Father, Not Like Daughter
14.plot: Theresa's father has always been a little freaked out by her gift. So during an anxiety-driven fishing trip with her dad, Theresa invites him to experience a group reading up close. Will the reading change her dad's mind or will he remain in disbelief?

15.title: Halloween Spirit
15.plot: Theresa's least favorite holiday is Halloween but when she gets a call to do a group reading in costume she reluctantly agrees. Will she be able to channel spirit in her Halloween get-up? Also, Theresa helps a mourning couple.

17.title: Hello College
17.plot: Sending off their baby girl to college is not an easy task for the Caputo family. After moving their daughter into her new dorm, Theresa and Larry leave their little girl behind and begin the next chapter of their lives.

1.title: Behind the Read
1.plot: In this special episode, catch up with Theresa's past clients and spontaneous reads to find out more about their experiences and how these reading changed their lives.

3.title: Sandy Spirit
3.plot: After surveying the horrific damage of Hurricane Sandy, Theresa brings comfort to affected Long Islanders with messages from their departed loved ones. Plus, Theresa's brother Mike who shares some very interesting stories about growing up with a medium.

4.title: The Royal Flush
4.plot: When the Caputos' decide to redo their bathroom, Larry becomes overwhelmed with the amount of work and questions Theresa's decorating style. Also, Theresa encounters a spirit that she has never felt before leaving her in a complete state of shock.

6.title: The Gambler
6.plot: When Larry Jr. hosts a poker game at the house, Theresa feels the need to throw her hand in the mix. And in a group reading, a young girl hears a validation from her deceased brother that no one else would know.

7.title: Why Me
7.plot: Theresa finally asks the question of why was she chosen to have this gift. Will she actually get the answer? Also, a woman picking her sister up from work hears an unexpected message from their mom.

8.title: Louie's Lost
8.plot: The Caputo family is completely distraught after their dog Louie goes missing. Even with all of the emotional stress of Louie being gone, Theresa still must give readings and channel spirit.

9.title: The Medium Matchmaker
9.plot: Theresa puts her mediumship aside when she takes on the responsibility of setting her cousin up with a new man.Plus, a woman in a group reading is shocked to hear from a spirit she didn't anticipate on coming through.

10.title: Girls Night In
10.plot: Theresa hasn't seen her friends in awhile so she decides to invite them over for a girls' night. Plus, a man hears an incredible message from his dad.

11.title: Spirit on the Slopes
11.plot: When Larry Jr. entices his family to go skiing, Theresa becomes more concerned about how she looks than how she skis. And a woman in a private reading is amazed at the details that Theresa brings up about her deceased son.

12.title: Bouffants and Bingo
12.plot: After a Bingo game where Theresa once again freaks her dad out, the medium does a group reading to help with one of the town's local organizations. Later, three kids hear incredible messages in one of the most powerful readings that Theresa has ever done.

13.title: The Pincushion
13.plot: To help her husband quit smoking, Theresa takes Larry for acupuncture. However, upon arrival Larry immediately insists on his wife joining him on the journey. And, a woman and her daughter are utterly spooked by the noises occurring in their house.

14.title: Once Upon a Dream
14.plot: After having a dream about her husband cheating on her, Theresa coerces Larry & their son to take dance lessons with her. Also, a woman hears a message from her deceased husband that no one else would know.

15.title: The Patient
15.plot: Theresa is in total disarray after a mole removed from her foot is being tested for melanoma. Plus, a couple hears from their deceased child in one of Theresa's most powerful group readings.

16.title: Unseen
16.plot: In this very special hour, Theresa gives viewers an exclusive inside look into readings that have never been seen before, including a spontaneous reading at a tanning salon, a reading with a former detective and a house cleansing with a unfriendly spirit.

1.title: On the Road: Philadelphia
1.plot: Theresa hits the road once again and travels to Philadelphia to surprise people with messages from their loved ones. Theresa helps a mother heal from her son's tragic passing and a young widow to recconect with her true love.

2.title: Construction Zone
2.plot: Theresa decides to do work on the house because of mold. However Larry has no idea how big the project actually is. To add the chaos Victoria is back from college with an unannounced friend. And a couple who lost their son receive a life-changing message.

3.title: Shoo Shoo Spirit
3.plot: When the house construction becomes an impending reality, Theresa is forced to figure out alternative places to do her readings. And, Theresa allows a devastated man to release the guilt he feels from his parents' tragic passing.

5.title: Gluten Free V
5.plot: When it comes to their kids, mothers' know best. So when Victoria adamantly claims that she is allergic to gluten, Theresa thinks her daughter is being way over-dramatic. Then, a man hears validations from his wife that no one else would know.

6.title: Momma's Boy
6.plot: Theresa is caught off guard when she finds out that her son wants to get his motorcycle license. And in a group reading, a woman hears details from a harrowing incident in her past.

7.title: Diving Right In
7.plot: If the construction on the Caputo's house wasn't already enough, Theresa decides she wants to add a swimming pool to the plans. Plus, Theresa is shocked when spirit appears in a way that she has never seen before.

8.title: When There's a Will
8.plot: When Theresa and Larry decide to do a will, the kids have a very unique reaction. And, spirits show up in a spin class. Plus, Theresa meets with a young boy who's suffering with a troubling disease in addition to the loss of his dad.

9.title: Just Me and V in the Catskills
9.plot: In need of some serious mother-daughter bonding, Theresa and Victoria head upstate to get in touch with Mother Nature. While there, the girls are put to the ultimate test when they have to milk

10.title: Bunny Love
10.plot: The Caputo House is turned upside down when Theresa's husband Larry rescues a bunny from the wild. But will Theresa let Larry keep his new furry friend or will she send the bunny hopping? And, a woman hears from her young daughter.

11.title: Ready to Leave
11.plot: With Victoria going back to school, the Caputo family enjoys a last supper together. However, lobster night quickly turns crabby when Larry Jr. tells his mother he wants to move out with his girlfriend. Also, a grieving mother hears from her son.

12.title: Revisited
12.plot: Visiting past clients that have been most affected by her messages from spirit, Theresa follows up with the people whose lives have drastically changed since their readings. Spirit comes through with new messages that will help them continue to heal.

13.title: Back to Normal
13.plot: Although the construction is finally coming to an end, the Caputo house still feels unsettled since Larry Jr. has yet to decide if he will move out or not. Plus, Theresa encounters a woman that gets absolutely furious in a private reading.

14.title: Christmas at the Caputo's
14.plot: Closure and peace are the gifts for many families during this special one hour holiday episode. Theresa reunites a family with the dad who passed away during a holiday foot race.

18.title: On the Road: New Orleans
18.plot: Theresa is on the road again, this time doing surprise readings in New Orleans! Grab a beignet and put on your Mardi Gras beads, as Theresa brings Long Island to New Orleans.

1.title: On The Road: Las Vegas Part I
1.plot: Luck is a lady named Theresa Caputo! Theresa is on the road surprising lucky fans with readings in Las Vegas! The whole Caputo family comes along and takes in the best Vegas has to offer. Later, Theresa surprises a woman at her bachelorette party.

2.title: On The Road: Las Vegas Part II
2.plot: Theresa's still on the road, surprising fans in Las Vegas! Theresa scrambles to save the surprise when the woman she's come to give a reading shows up early. Later, even Theresa gets a surprise when a woman's deceased son makes his presence known.

5.title: Surprise Visit
5.plot: When Victoria tells her family that she's interested in a poledancing class at school, Larry decides that he and Theresa need to pay her a surprise visit. Then, Theresa helps a woman connect with her brothers, who were both killed in the same tragic crime

6.title: Medium Love
6.plot: This year, Theresa decides she will take control over her and Larry's Valentine's Day plans, but will unanticipated forces ruin the entire evening for them? Then, Theresa connects the spirit of a long-deceased man with his sister, the results are shocking

8.title: Chinese New Year
8.plot: Continuing to fill her empty nest with new activities, Theresa decides to investigate and celebrate Chinese New Year for the first time. Then, Theresa brings comfort to several generations of a family who've had a rough couple of years.

9.title: Horsing Around
9.plot: When Larry decides to revisit his childhood passion of horseback riding, a reluctant Theresa agrees to go with him. Later, Theresa reunites a single mother with her husband who passed away in a tragic accident.

10.title: Out of the Attic
10.plot: It's Spring Cleaning time in the Caputo household, but Theresa can't seem to let anything go. And later, Theresa shocks a woman during a reading when she brings up the unusual item she put in her mother's coffin.

11.title: It Ain't Easy Being Me
11.plot: When Larry gets upset with Theresa's spending habits, the two of them decide to trade lives for a day. And, Theresa connects a young woman with her mother, and helps grieving parents who lost their teenage son.

13.title: Gone Fishing
13.plot: Larry gave in on the swimming pool Theresa wanted last year, so now he's cashing in the favor. He wants a koi pond, and wants the team from Tanked to install it. In the process, Theresa reconnects one of the men installing the pond with his father.

15.title: On the Road: DC
15.plot: Theresa is on the road surprising unsuspecting viewers with readings in our nation's capitol ! In between visiting America's most historic sites, Theresa connects a group of sisters with their deceased mother.

1.title: 25 and Counting
1.plot: On the season premiere, Theresa & Larry begin a year-long commemoration of their 25th wedding anniversary by visiting the restaurant where they had their first date almost 30 years ago. And Theresa also does her first surprise reading on Long Island.

2.title: Dog Eat Dog Summer
2.plot: The whole family is still dealing with the loss of their dog Petey. It's been especially hard on their other dog Louie. Victoria wants to get a new dog, but Theresa strongly objects. Later, Theresa gives a reading to a skeptical woman.

3.title: Back to My Roots
3.plot: Inspired by old scrapbooks uncovered by her Dad, Theresa goes to a genealogist to learn more about her family history, and receives some shocking news. And,Theresa gives a message from spirit to a devastated family that helps them to heal.

4.title: Getting the Band Back Together
4.plot: Theresa Caputo used to be in a folk group? While assisting with a fundraiser for a childhood friend, Theresa's old band gets back together and performs for the first time in 30 years! And Theresa reconnects a man with his mother, who died tragically.

5.title: Don't Give Up Your Day Job
5.plot: Theresa was going to be a beautician if Spirit hadn't entered her life. So after a trip to the barbershop with Larry, she decides to enroll in beauty school to test out her skills. Later, Theresa connects a woman with her son.

6.title: On the Road: Texas
6.plot: They say everything is bigger in Texas, and Theresa & Larry's trip there is no exception! Big surprises and big moments unfold as Theresa hits the road again to surprise fans with readings.

7.title: Coach Theresa
7.plot: Theresa and Larry visit the restaurant where they ate every day while they were dating, but spirit interrupts their lunch. Later, Theresa helps a woman let go of the anger she has surrounding her brother's death.

8.title: Spirit Roll
8.plot: Theresa visits the house where she first saw Spirit. Then, she surprises a firefighter with a reading, but he fears his son won't come through. And, things turn competitive when Theresa and Larry take a sushi class.

9.title: Return to Jail
9.plot: Last year Theresa did a reading for a group of female inmates. After reuniting with a young woman who she met during her visit to jail, Theresa decides to return to the facility to do another reading. But this time shes reading a group of maile inmates.

10.title: Roller Rink Romance
10.plot: Theresa and Larry head to the roller rink to relive the 1980s, when she realizes they have never been roller skating together. Later, Theresa connects a devastated woman with her husband. And Theresa surprises a woman in Long Island with a reading.

11.title: When a Bedroom Door Closes, a Closet Door Opens
11.plot: Theresa nervously preps for her first colonoscopy. Will she go through with it or chicken out? Then, a man hopes to connect with his deceased wife. And later, Theresa helps a woman move forward after the lost of her mother in a tragic car accident.

12.title: Behind the Scenes of Knock and Shock
12.plot: From Theresa traveling in disguise to backstage mishaps and tensions, we pull back the curtain on what it took to pull off Long Island Medium's first Live Knock & Shock. Plus, never before seen bonus footage of the reading.

14.title: Theresa Loves Moms
14.plot: In the two hour season finale Theresa looks back at some of her most memorable mom readings, and holds a group reading with actress Olivia Munn and her Mom. Later the Caputos embark on a road trip to Florida surprising fans with readings along the way.

1.title: Celebrity Spirit
1.plot: Big Bang Theory's Jim Parsons and his sister get a reading.Then, Susan Lucci welcomes Theresa into her home. Later, Theresa channels spirit for Sopranos star Jamie Lynn Sigler. And Scandal's Katie Lowes travels to Long Island for a private reading.

2.title: Spirit in Paradise: Snowbirds
2.plot: Now that they've arrived, Theresa and Larry are ready to sample life in Florida and discover whether or not they can be Snowbirds. And, while under the blow dryer at a new hair salon, Theresa channels the brother of another customer.

3.title: Spirit in Paradise: The Son also Visits
3.plot: While Larry Sr. is out of town, Larry Jr. comes to visit Theresa in Florida, and brings her places she'd never go with her husband. Larry Jr. makes a nervous Theresa try out jet skis and she starts reading the instructor as they are jumping over waves.

4.title: Spirit in Paradise: The Decision
4.plot: Larry knows Theresa doesn't like riding motorcycles, but plans a special surprise to get her top change her mind. Later, Theresa surprises a homicide detective with messages from spirit. And it's decision time for the Caputos. Will they stay in Florida?

5.title: Before the Baby
5.plot: In this special half hour, Theresa reads expectant mothers looking for closure before the birth of their children.

6.title: Line of Duty
6.plot: In this one hour special, Theresa salutes hero police officers and firefighters, and reads people who have lost a loved one in the line of duty.

7.title: Parental Blessing
7.plot: It's an emotional half hour as Theresa reads people who are seeking the blessing of their deceased parents for their relationships.

8.title: I Don't Believe
8.plot: In Theresa's line of work, she constantly has to deal with skeptics. In this episode, spouses and relatives drag their non-believer family members to Theresa, to get them to change their minds.

9.title: Haunted Houses
9.plot: In an episode the likes of which we've not seen in years, Theresa visits and cleanses the homes of people who believe they are haunted. First, Theresa visits a home believed to be visited by the previous owner.

10.title: Wisdom Teeth
10.plot: Theresa reads a young couple who suffered a great loss. Then, Theresa connects a father with his two daughters, who want to continue his legacy. Later, when Larry, Jr. has to have his wisdom teeth removed.

11.title: Remembering Petey
11.plot: The Caputos have gone to the dogs! Almost a year after Petey's death, LJ and Victoria both have new puppies, and it's time to erect a memorial to Petey in the backyard. Larry Sr is overcome with emotion as they remember their trusted dog.

13.title: Live from Hollywood
13.plot: Host Chris Jacobs joins Theresa Caputo for a star-studded special live from Hollywood. Theresa goes into disguise to surprise fans, channels spirits for Jim Parsons, Olivia Munn, Jon Cryer and Lisa Joyner.

17.title: Block Party
17.plot: Theresa finds herself reflective as she undertakes two huge events: her largest-ever fundraiser group reading, and the return of her neighborhood block party. And, Theresa turns a skeptic into a believer when she channels a long-deceased spirit.

1.title: Caputo Christmas
1.plot: Closure and peace are the gifts for many families during this special one hour holiday episode. Theresa reunites a family with the dad who passed away during a holiday foot race.

1.title: Star Studded Spirit
1.plot: On this season premiere, Theresa gives readings to some of your favorite celebrities. Comedian Rosie O'Donnell, Oscar-winning actress and comic Mo'Nique, "Mike & Molly" star Billy Gardell, and Porsha from the hit show "Empire," Ta'Rhonda Jones.

2.title: I Now Pronounce You...
2.plot: Theresa is asked to officiate a wedding for two people who met at one of her group readings, and Larry is asked to be their best man. Before heading to Los Angeles for the ceremony, Theresa surprises a woman on Wall Street with a reading.

3.title: There's a Lump
3.plot: Fashion maven Carson Kressley gets a reading with Theresa. Theresa also channels a woman who died in a brutal murder, and does her first "automatic writing" in a decade. Nerves are frayed when Theresa's routine mammogram gives rise to some concern.

4.title: The Biopsy Is Back
4.plot: Theresa does a group reading for people in law enforcement, and reunites a man with the son who was accidentally shot. Later, waiting for the results of her biopsy has Theresa so on edge that she cancels a reading for the first time in 6 years.

5.title: An MRI for Larry
5.plot: While in Los Angeles, Theresa does a reading for "Scandal" star Guillermo Diaz. Theresa also channels for a woman who believes she has the gift as well.

6.title: Beauty School Drop-In
6.plot: Theresa reads for teenage triplets and a marine vet. Theresa gets big news from her daughter Victoria in regards to college decisions.

7.title: Victoria's Test
7.plot: Theresa gives a reading to a skeptical father that lost his son. Later, a transgender woman discovers how much support she's getting from the other side. And Victoria, who recently dropped out of college for beauty school uses her family as guinea pigs.

8.title: Is the Gift Real
8.plot: At a group reading, Theresa brings closure to a man who has been tortured by his son's death. Then, Theresa gets a brain scan while she's channeling, in the hopes doctors can tell her what goes on in her head when she's channeling spirit.

9.title: Panick Attack
9.plot: Theresa's gets the surprising results from her brain scan with Dr. Amen. At a group reading, Theresa validates the presence of a loved one by telling his family what underwear he wore at his funeral.

10.title: The Spirits of Hollywood
10.plot: It's a star-studded season finale with "Don't Be Tardy's" Kim Zolciak-Biermann and the Buffalo Bills' Kroy Biermann, "Parks & Recreation's" Jim O'Heir "The Goldbergs" , Wendi McClendon-Covey and "Young & Hungry" star Kym Whitley all getting readings.

3.title: Freezing Theresa
3.plot: "Shark Tank" shark Barbara Corcoran gets a reading with Theresa. At a fundraiser, Theresa channels an accident victim for the distraught police officer who couldn't save him. Theresa reads a man while she's inside a cryogenic freezing chamber.

4.title: Theresa Crashes Victoria's Date
4.plot: Victoria goes speed dating as Theresa crashes it and ends up reading people there. A sceptic turns into a believer with contact from her father.

5.title: Southern Fried Spirit
5.plot: In Nashville, Theresa reunites country singer Jesse James Decker with the souls of old friends who died tragically. And, what does the future hold with Larry?

1.title: The Breaking Point
1.plot: In an emotional 2-hour season premiere, Theresa goes to Fire Island and conducts one of the most powerful group readings of her life. Later, Theresa and Larry confront their issues have a devastating conversation about the future of their marriage.

2.title: A Big Decision
2.plot: Theresa brings healing to a couple whose son took his life as a result of being bullied, and is inspired to read and comfort a group of teens who have also been victimized by their peers. Theresa and Larry begin deciding whether they should separate.

3.title: Knock, Knock, It's Theresa
3.plot: Theresa Caputo is an average mum from Long Island - except that she talks to the dead. And, she has turned sceptics into believers.

4.title: Theresa on Tour
4.plot: Theresa Caputo is an average mum from Long Island - except that she talks to the dead. With a waiting list of over two years, she has turned sceptics into believers.

-1.title: Sage is the Rage
-1.plot: As a housewarming present for her brother, Theresa decides she will show up at the housewarming party and burn sage, without telling him first. Then, Theresa reconnects a woman with her son, who she believes has been communicating with her.

imdb.plot outline: Series revolves around Theresa Caputo as she takes clients on an emotional and spiritual journey with the afterlife, including finding closure with recently departed loved ones and navigating the demands of her retired husband, 21-year-old son and somewhat skeptical 17-year-old daughter.
imdb.title: Long Island Medium
plot: Follows Theresa Caputo, a normal mom from New York who balances a full family life with her ability to communicate with the dead. Each episode will show how this gift impacts her life and the lives of those around her.::Anonymous

Series revolves around Theresa Caputo as she takes clients on an emotional and spiritual journey with the afterlife, including finding closure with recently departed loved ones and navigating the demands of her retired husband, 21-year-old son and somewhat skeptical 17-year-old daughter.::Anonymous
